attributes.action: Bring Amber Alert To The UK
attributes.additional_details:
We The Undersigned Wish To See Amber Alert In The Whole Of The United Kingdom.

In This Day And Age,The Media And The Public And The Police Work Together When A Child Is Missing/Abducted And An Amber Alert Would Be Beneficial To The Family Of The Missing Child And Also To The Public And The Police. It Has Proven Effective In Other Countries So In The Times We Live In It Would Be A Good Idea
